attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide all appropriate direct contact details of all M.P's on the No.10 Home Page. Ensuring that they have a maximum of 5 working days to respond with a further 10 working days to give a full answer or complete details of why they cannot.Additionally any M.P. must answer a question if it is within their remit even if the question is not from one of their constituants.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
